text: (Napiye!) Evarukku allahvum arul purintu, nirum avar mitu arul purintiro, avaritattil nir; "allahvukkup payantu nir um manaiviyai (vivaka vilakkuc ceytu vitamal) um'mitame nirutti vaittuk kollum" enru conna potu allah veliyakka iruntatai, manitarkalukkup payantu nir um'mutaiya manattil maraittu vaittiruntir; anal allah avan tan, nir payappatuvatarkut takutiyutaiyavan; akave jaitu avalai vivaka vilakku ceytuvitta pinnar nam avalai umakku manam ceyvittom; enenral muhminkalal (cuvikarittu) valarkkappattavarkal, tam manaivimarkalai vivakarattuc ceytu vittal, a(varkalai valartta)varkal appenkalai manantu kolvatil yatoru tataiyumirukkak kutatu enpatarkaka (itu) nataiperre tira ventiya allahvin kattalaiyakum
